title: They Were About To Get Physical...Until He Made This Disturbing Confession
description:
Intimacy is very important to her, so she wasn't in a rush to hop into bed with a guy she recently started dating. Three months later, she was ready to take the next step. But then, he made a terrifying confession that RUINED EVERYTHING!
